lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Vittorio Cassoni, president of ATT's newly-formed Data Systems Group, said the company will not offer the new machines until the merged version of UNIX is completed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ATT said the version of UNIX used by the new computer will incorporate po;ular features of the Berkeley 4.2 system, a dirative of the UNIX system used widely in scientific and engineering markets, as well as features of SunOs, a variant of the Berkely system sold by Sun.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ATT said it would take 18 months to two years to develop new computers based on the Sun microchip and the merged version of the UNIX operating system.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Vittorio Cassoni, president of ATT's newly-formed Data Systems Group, said the company will not offer the new machines until the merged version of UNIX is completed.
